p: Human embryonic kidney cell line 293T and Madin-Darby canine kidney (MDCK) epithelial cells were obtained from Dr. Fei Deng (Wuhan Institute of Virology, CAS, China) and grown in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM; Cellgro, Manassas, VA, USA) supplemented with fetal bovine serum (10%; Gibco, Carlsbad, CA, USA), penicillin and streptomycin (1000 units/mL and 100 µg/mL, respectively; Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA). Opti-MEM containing 2 µg/mL N-tosyl-L-phenylalanine chloromethyl ketone (TPCK)–trypsin (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) was used to perform infections. All cells were grown at 37 °C in 5% CO 2.
